clutter_correction¶

pycraf.pathprof.clutter_correction(h_g, zone, freq)[source] [edit on github]¶

Calculate the Clutter loss of a propagating radio wave according to ITU-R P.452-16 Eq (57).

Parameters
h_gQuantity

Height over ground [m]

zoneCLUTTER enum, optional

Clutter category for terminal.

freqQuantity

Frequency of radiation [GHz]

Returns
A_hQuantity

Clutter correction to path attenuation [dB]
